completeListOfAbilities.name: Walk the Plank
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
4-hit group melee  PG attack + group  PF attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Removes all targets' buffs
Sneak Attack use +1 after use (with upper limit)
Becomes Walk the Plank: Light when following party turn

completeListOfAbilities.name: Walk the Plank: Light
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
4-hit group melee  PG attack + group  PF attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Removes all targets' buffs
Additional 4-hit single-target  PO magic  PG attack + single-target  PF attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Sneak Attack use +1 after use (with upper limit)

passives.name: Sneak Attack Extension
passives.desc:
Sneak Attack use +1

When using Sneak Attack:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 4; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 â€¢ Slightly increased BRV damage when attacking enemy not targeting self
 â€¢ Triggers additional  PF attack after use

After using Sneak Attack:
 â€¢ Sneak Attack becomes Sneak Attack (Hide) (slight BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; guaranteed hitã€? deals extra damage when attacking enemy whether or not targeting self; returns to Sneak Attackã€? Powder Keg (Hide) returns to Powder Keg after use)
passives.short_desc: Sneak Attack Extension: Boost to Sneak Attack

passives.name: Buff Attack Speed
passives.desc: Largely raises ATKã€? moderately raises SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Attack Speed: Raises ATKã€? SPD

passives.name: Powder Keg Extension
passives.desc:
Powder Keg use +1

When using Powder Keg:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 5; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 â€¢ Slightly increased BRV damage when attacking enemy not targeting self
 â€¢ Slight DEF Down boost
 â€¢ 8 turns slight boost to MAX BRV Upã€? Critical Hit Rate Up
 â€¢ Triggers additional  PF attack after use

After using Sneak Attack:
 â€¢ Powder Keg becomes Powder Keg (Hide) (slight BRV damage boost; guaranteed hitã€? deals extra damage when attacking enemy whether or not targeting self; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; returns to Powder Kegã€? Sneak Attack (Hide) returns to Sneak Attack after use)

With active buffs:
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; deals extra BRV damage when attacking enemy not targeting self)
passives.short_desc: Powder Keg Extension: Boost to Powder Keg
